resources:
GeoQuiz 1) Canberra is the capital of Australia. 2) The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean. 3) The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean. 4) The source of the Nile River is in Egypt. 5) The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas. 6) Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
The largest country in the world is Russia. The River Thames flows through Cambridge. River Severn goes through both England and Wales. Volcanoes are often found on tectonic plates. There are dolphins in the Amazon river. Rivers hold 20% of the worldâ€™s water. Mount Snowdon is the highest mountain in Wales. 7) The sides of the river are called the bed. 8) Tuvalu is the country with the smallest population. 9) Norway is the country with the longest coastline. // False Milan is located in Lombardy. // True Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan. // True Bergamo is located in Northern Italy. // True 10) China borders 14 other countries. // True
